name: BAE Systems
membership:
Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe (ASD)
Centre for European Reform (CER)
goal: BAE Systems is a global defence and security company with approximately 83,000 employees worldwide. The Company delivers a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and support services.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: European defence Fund (EDIDP and EDRP), EU defence market, other EU defence initiatives, Brexit, Research
